actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A bill to make the theft, embezzlement, or unlawful concealment of a flag of the United States an offense against the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to make it a misdemeanor for any person to unlawfully conceal, take, steal, or embezzle any flag of the United States. Prohibits any person from receiving or disposing of such a flag. Provides for a fine of not more than $1,000, or imprisonment for not more than one year, or both.

titles.title: A bill to make the theft, embezzlement, or unlawful concealment of a flag of the United States an offense against the United States.
